title: [CRITICAL] Fix TypeScript compilation errors blocking production build
body:
## Problem
The project currently has 70+ TypeScript errors that prevent clean builds.

## Impact
- Blocks production deployments
- Reduces code reliability
- Prevents enabling strict mode benefits

## Tasks
- [ ] Fix type errors in stores/featureToggles.old.ts
- [ ] Resolve performanceMonitor.ts case sensitivity issues
- [ ] Fix Vue file type errors in build process
- [ ] Enable strict TypeScript checking

## Acceptance Criteria
- npm run typecheck passes with 0 errors
- Build completes successfully
- All tests pass

## Priority: CRITICAL
## Effort: 8 story points
